name: SJArtworx
tagline: North West Creative Design & Artwork Services
description:
With over twenty five years of experience in the creative industries both as a freelancer and an employee, I offer a comprehensive Creative Artwork service spanning all disciplines of print based artwork, retouching and illustration.
I have specialist branding and packaging experience and I can confidently manage the pre-press and print elements of any project.
I maintain a ‘can-do’ attitude and I'm capable of organising and taking ownership of projects and seeing them through to delivery.
